## Research groups to which I belong

- **Statistical methods applied in agriculture, life sciences and education** (Principal investigator)

-  **Valencia Bayesian Research Group (VABAR)**. Based at the University of Valencia.

- **Statistical Modeling Ecology Group (SMEG)**. An inter-disciplinary research group, linking researchers from the Schools of Mathematics and Statistics, Biology and Ecology.

## Current Status

- Deputy Vice-Rector for Research.

- Head of the Joint Research Unit on Statistical Methods in Health Sciences UMH-FISABIO (UMI MECIS UMH-FISABIO)

- Statistical Editor  *Public Health Nutrition*.

## Professional Societies

- Former Treasurer of the Spanish Region of the International Biometric Society (2014-2019).

- Member of the Representative Council of the International Biometric Society (2021-2025).
